charinfo.name: Uchiha Obito
charinfo.description: A minor member of the Uchiha clan and a chuunin, Obito is a member of Team Minato. While Obito does not possess any singular powerful ability, he can use all of what he knows with his developing sharingan to put up a fight.

abilities.name: Piercing Stab
abilities.description: Finding an opening in his enemy's defense, Obito quickly stabs them dealing 15 piercing damage to the enemy. During 'Obito Sharingan' this skill will deal an additional 10 damage.

abilities.name: Obito Great Fireball
abilities.description: Obito breaths searing fire on one enemy dealing 15 affliction damage to them for 2 turns. During 'Obito Sharingan', this skill will deal an instant 30 affliction damage and have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Obito Sharingan
abilities.description: Obito targets one ally. For 4 turns, Obito will gain 15 points of damage reduction. If Obito dies, that ally will gain 5 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage permanently.

abilities.name: Obito Flee
abilities.description: This skill makes Uchiha Obito invulnerable for 1 turn.
